message.body: Hey Hunter. How are you? I was wondering if you're free sometime now to early evening sometime for me to stop by to give you your prints.
Hello Hunter. I just got a big berkey yesterday and I was curious if it should be taking a full 24hrs to filter one container of water or is something go
ing on there. It just seems like a long time. Also the threaded holes on the fluoride filters are too small to fit the stems of the ceramic filters. I ca
n fit them on to the end of the stems but can't screw them on. I contacted the manufacturer but I was just curious if you had any ideas. Thanks
Oh I see now. I need the f4 fluoride filters to go with the ceramic filters.
The black filters are better than the ceramic filters. It should only take maybe 30 min to filter 3 gallons
